name: Twentythirdle!
description:
This is a 23 letter Wordle clone I made for absolutely no reason except that I was bored. It isn't a daily challenge, so you can reopen it as many times in one day as you like. Here's how to play:

- The game chooses a secret 23-letter word from its list. The aim is to try and guess the word in as few attempts as possible.

- Guess a word by typing it into the text box at the bottom of the screen, and pressing the green 'enter' button.

- Each letter will get a colour. If a letter is green, it means that letter appears in the same spot in the secret word. If it is yellow, it appears in a different spot/multiple different spots. If it stays grey, then the letter doesn't appear at all.

- If you don't get it within 6 guesses, you lose and the word is shown on the screen.

A list of all the 23-letter words the game uses can be found in the .zip folder, beside the executable.

NOTE: This game is basically a joke. Don't take it too seriously.
